mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDR_DETAIL, EXTRA_ADDRESS, PHONE, AGREE_STATE, SIGN_IN, PW_MODIFIED, INFO_MODIFIED) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{addrDetail}, #{extraAddress}, #{phone}, #{agreeState}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO MEMBER_LOG (ID, SIGN_UP) VALUES (#{id}, NOW())

INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDR_DETAIL, EXTRA_ADDRESS, PHONE, AGREE_STATE, SIGN_IN, PW_MODIFIED, INFO_MODIFIED) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{addrDetail}, #{extraAddress}, #{phone}, #{agreeState}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDR_DETAIL, EXTRA_ADDRESS, PHONE, AGREE_STATE, SIGN_IN, PW_MODIFIED, INFO_MODIFIED, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
